title: Hears the pitch: Team invents a new mode of photoacoustic imaging

title_detail.value: Hears the pitch: Team invents a new mode of photoacoustic imaging

summary: Physicists developed a new mode of photoacoustic imaging called F-mode. This new mode selectively enhances photoacoustic image features based on the size of the object and the sounds it produces.

summary_detail.value: Physicists developed a new mode of photoacoustic imaging called F-mode. This new mode selectively enhances photoacoustic image features based on the size of the object and the sounds it produces.
